resources.string: Messages in this chat are not encrypted. Servers often store transient messages in an archive. This allows easy device synchronization and server-side history search, but adds privacy risks.
Messages in this chat are encrypted with end-to-end encryption. You must always confirm the identity of your contact by verifying encryption keys fingerprints.
Identities of users in this group are public, so any member can contact you using your real XMPP ID.
Identities of users in this group are kept hidden from each other, only group admins can access your real XMPP ID. Be vigilant, do not disclose yourself by being careless.
Private chat with incognito user. Messages are routed through group server and your identities are kept secret from each other. Be vigilant, do not disclose yourself by being careless.
